work.title: Chase
work.desc: Pushing the boundaries of banking on the go
work.body1:
Brainstorming what was possible with mobile banking

We were asked by Chase to propose some new ideas around ways that mobile banking can make their customer's lives more convenient than ever before. What you see above is the result of a few quick brainstorms, fleshed out into rough wireframes.
work.body2:
What I did

Working with a creative director, we quickly concepted out a few simple user flows to demonstrate a few key new features that Chase may pursue in the future.
